title: [Game Mode] Double Item Mayhem
body:
http://i.giphy.com/CMtBKBCUL2tvG.gif

Cowbell's not the only thing this game needs more of...

... ... Okay, that statement's sacrilegious. Forget I said that. It didn't happen. Let's move on.

I suggested this a couple years back, but didn't get any feedback. My current struggle with finding room for trinity/sterack on jungle Vi has made me nostalgic. To quote the original description (with forum icons, S6 updates, and random double-boot BS added):

> Ever had a champion that you just wanted too many things from all at once?
>
>Can't play {{champion:102}} without having all these items simultaneously? (I know I can't)
> 
> {{item:1401}} {{item:1419}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3091}} {{item:3748}} {{item:3074}} {{item:3102}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3047}} {{item:3111}} {{item:3075}}{{item:3143}} 
>
> #Then this is the gametype for you! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
>
> #With *** double the cap on items, and double the gold from all sources ***! 
>
> #Build the perfect full-crit + full-arpen + full-tank build on {{champion:18}}! {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} 
> #Or just troll the enemy team with 6 additional {{item:3027}} on {{champion:13}} ! {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
> #You can never have too much of a good thing... or a bad thing as this will probably turn out to be 90% of the time.
> #(I'm looking at you AD {{champion:1}}!). {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} 

Things I would add:

* Double the cap on certain stats (Maybe not CDR. That's an URF thing.)
* Would be hard to code, 'cause it's pre-game setup, but double the mastery points and point cap on a given mastery.
* Double the cap on passive/active "uniqueness" (Stack them twice, but no more.)
* Double all stats on minions, monsters, and towers (we don't want them to melt.)
* DOUBLE THE RESPAWNS! (vague inaccurate way of saying "halve the respawn times")
* Double the level cap, ability point cap, and exp.
* #NAME IT DOUBLE JEOPARDY.

Regarding uniques: Can be the same version of the passive/active doubled (2 tabis = 20% reduction of damage from aa's, probably multiplicative, not additive though.) or 2 different versions of the same unique working together instead of one canceling the other (ravenous + titanic). My suggested build for Shyv totally doesn't make me biased in this matter at all. Just a thought... let it simmer.

P.S. {{champion:39}} + {{item:3111}} + {{item:3111}} + {{item:2138}} + {{item:2138}} + Swiftness mastery x 10 = 90% tenacity {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

I think you've flushed out tank potential more than nuker potential. If you double certain stat caps, one of them might be attack speed. What happens when every adc is pre-post-reversal kog'maw, only they can move and there's no base damage nerf to 55%? Okay, maybe you don't double attack speed cap, but you still double the uniqueness cap. What happens when each auto can apply borkrazor on-hit twice? What happens when 2 runaan's send out 4 bolts and each bolt applies 2 borks and 2 bloodrazors? What does double guinsoo's do (that's going to give me a headache...) What happens when LW penetration applies multiplicatively twice? What happens when dominick's other passive applies twice? (I don't think cleaver shred cap would increase. You'd just apply 2 stacks per hit instead of one. But still...)

There's a lot of different ways this could spin depending on the extent to which certain ideas are applied in my original post. But it definitely doesn't all favor tanks. I think it basically gives every champion a chance to explode in the face of every other champion. It's very hard to say.
